jobDescription: Contact: 408-643-2767 or email to priyanka.malihalli@gmail.com, priya@zenaide.comGreetings!!! One of our banking client in bay area is looking for Data Engineer JD is shared below:ResponsibilitiesParticipate in build vs buy analysis of MDM (Master Data Management) tool and recommend the right toolImplement the MDM SolutionCreate MDM best practices and how boundary systems would interact with MDM systemDevelop ETL and implement best practices for ETL developmentCreate ETL pipelines that are highly optimized with small and large data setsCreate solutions for hierarchy management and reference data.Work effectively using scrum with multiple team members to deliver analytical solutions to the business functions.Solve issues with data models and come up with solutionsRequired SkillsPrior experience working with Master Data technologies (Reltio, Informatica etc.)Prior experience in designing master data (Customer Master, Contact Master), hierarchies and reference data Preferred experience working with D&B; Preferred experience with Snap Logic data integration or any packaged data integration tool.Communication Skills: Master Data Engineers are part of a team, working with database administrators, data analysts and management and need to be effective communicators.Attention to Detail: Databases are complex, and a minute error can cause huge problems.Problem-Solving Skills: Data Engineers look at an issue that needs to be solved and come up with solutions quickly.Qualifications8+ years of experience with Master Data and data warehouse projectsBS in Computer Science preferred or equivalent is requiredExperience working with APIs to collect or ingest data.Strong Database knowledgeDemonstrated academic or professional statistics and math skillsWrite complex SQL for processing raw data, data validation and QA Regards, Priyanka Technical Recruiter  408 564 7176 408 564 0254 priya@zenaide.com  4880 Stevens Creek Blvd. Suite 202, San Jose  CA 95129 USA www.zenaide.com  - provided by Dice  MDM, SQL, Data Warehouse
